Comment 7 by **AllenGnr**: 
Thanks for your advise Alex, I updated the demo code. And I tested it on 6 Windows 7 pc
of my colleagues, the crash can be reproduced.

Attached is the refined code, please make and install w32 package, and compile "gui.go".
After the window popup, click the client area of the window, you suppose to see the
crash.

BTW, I tested this program in Windows Server 2008, and Windows XP SP3, it works well.
Seems it only crashes on Windows 7.
Attachments: 1. w32.zip (6833 bytes)
